text: Ezɨ Iesus uan agharim isa gumazir kam gatɨgha ghaze, “Kɨ ifonge. Nɨn mɨkarzim zuegh, egh ua deragh.” A kamaghɨn mɨgɨavɨra itima, gumazir kamɨn lepan arɨmariam zuamɨra anetaghizɨma gumazim ua dera.8:3 Judabar akar mam ghaze, gumazim lepan arɨmariam ikɨtɨ nɨ an suiragh, nɨ uaghan Godɨn damazimɨn mɨze. Ezɨ Iesus uan dafarim isava gumazir lepa itir kam gatɨ, egha Godɨn damazimɨn mɨzezir puvatɨ. A gumazimɨn arɨmariam a gɨfa, ezɨ gumazim ua dera.
